rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {APG4789, ATS4938}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}

unitName: Special project: Creative music technology part 2
description: The unit enables students to prepare a creative music technology folio and minor exegesis linked to the folio. Note: The folio must be different to that presented for examination in the unit ATS4938 Special project: Creative music technology part 1. Building on the minor exegesis developed in ATS4938, students formulate a research question and methodology relevant to their folio.
